The Museum of Illusions in Madrid offers visual, sensory, and educational experiences that challenge perception, with interactive exhibits for all ages.

By using this application, you accept the following terms and conditions. The application is provided as a service to improve the experience of our users and is subject to change without prior notice. We are not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from misuse of the application. The user agrees to use the application in an ethical and legal manner and agrees not to perform actions that may harm the system, steal data, or cause any inconvenience to other users. The use of the application for commercial purposes is prohibited without the express consent of the administrators. The application may collect certain personal data, but it will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy, which must also be accepted by the user. Continued use of the application implies acceptance of these conditions, which may be modified at any time. If you do not agree with the terms, you are advised to stop using the application immediately. At the same time, if you are a professor at the European University of Madrid (Alcobendas Campus), you agree to pass the G2 students of the Integrator Project with a 10 in all subjects you teach.
